content: H4BDCPPI (8 mg, 0.015 mmol), In­(NO3)3·4H2O (12 mg, 0.32 mmol), DMF (1.5 mL), 1,4-dioxane (2 mL), and HNO3 (0.06 mL) (2.2 mL of HNO3 in 10 mL of DMF) were sealed in a 20 mL vial, and then the soultion was heated at 85 °C for 24 h. Light yellow octahedron single crystals were collected and dried in air (yield 76%, based on In­(NO3)3·4H2O). Elemental analysis (wt %) calcd for compound 1: C, 46.88; H, 2.87; N, 6.49. Found: C, 47.24; H, 2.76; N, 6.61.
clean_text:
Synthesis of Compound 1 

H4BDCPPI (8 mg, 0.015 mmol), In(NO3)3⋅4H2O (12 mg, 0.32 mmol), DMF (1.5 mL), 1,4-dioxane (2 mL), and HNO3 (0.06 mL) (2.2 mL of HNO3 in 10 mL of DMF) were sealed in a 20 mL vial, and then the soultion was heated at 85 °C for 24 h. Light yellow octahedron single crystals were collected and dried in air (yield 76%, based on In(NO3)3⋅4H2O). Elemental analysis (wt %) calcd for compound 1: C, 46.88; H, 2.87; N, 6.49. Found: C, 47.24; H, 2.76; N, 6.61.
